FuncDef:
The l2tp enable command enables the L2TP function.
The undo l2tp enable command disables the L2TP function.
By default, the L2TP function is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The L2TP function is available only after the l2tp enable command is configured.If the L2TP is disabled, a device cannot provide the L2TP function even if the L2TP parameters are configured.
Precautions
Running the undo l2tp enable command affects traffic of online users. Confirm the action based on the display message before running the command.
